target:
echo "=== Test 1: pai-* files get updated ===" && ./pai update --dry-run 2>&1 | grep -E "Would update.*pai-" | head -5

echo "" && echo "=== Test 2: Check if non pai-* files would be skipped ===" && ./pai update --dry-run 2>&1 | grep -E "skip|Skip" | head -3

echo "" && echo "=== Test 3: Create a test user file and verify it's not touched ===" && mkdir -p ~/.pai/skills/my-test-skill && echo "user content" > ~/.pai/skills/my-test-skill/SKILL.md && ./pai update --dry-run 2>&1 | grep -E "my-test" |
